ivory.lsh.data

Class PermutationByBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.lsh.data.Permutation
      • ivory.lsh.data.PermutationByBlock

  • public class PermutationByBlock
extends Permutation
    Permute a list of ints, block-by-block, as described in WWW07 paper by Manku et al (output permutation array uses a 0-index)
    Author:
    ferhanture
